title: Migrant joy as an act of resistance
description: 2025 has been a year of throwing our arms up while the rollercoaster shakes us from side to side. The uphill climb feels slow, intimidating, painful; the drops are worse — short, devastating, fast, dangerous. No truce, just exhaustion. Sometimes we want to stop the world and get off, but adrenaline — and that passion...
